ilex.fitting.func_fit

func_fit(x, y, fit_func, fit_priors: dict | None = None, static_priors: dict | None = None, **kwargs)[source]
Info:

Fit function using Baysian inference (Bilby)

Parameters:

  • x (ndarray) – x data

  • y (ndarray) – y data

  • fit_priors (dict) – initial fitting parameters

  • static_priors (dict) – priors to keep constant

  • **kwargs – fitting parameters for BILBY

Returns:

fit parameter class container

Return type:

params (fit_par)
